alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN BOX BUTTE...NORTHEASTERN MORRILL AND SOUTHEASTERN DAWES COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM MDT... At 559 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Wild Horse Butte to near The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62. Movement was north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Wild Horse Butte, Berea and Alliance Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
